text: tavada ‘kristiyanuvan (kisima dharmayaka) næta’yi yudevvan pavasannaha. (esema) ‘yudevvan (kisima dharmayaka) næta’yi kristiyanuvan pavasannaha. namut movun (tamange mema kiyamanata sadhakayan vasayen bayibalaye ‘pærani testamentuva’ nam vu tavrat namæti ekama) dharmayama kiyavannaha! movun pavasa ganna akarayatama (dharmaya) dæna nogat (samanayan taba namadinnan) aya “(yudevvanda kristiyanuvanda kisima dharmayakata ayat aya novannaha” yayi) pavasannaha. namut movun tarka karamin sitina (mema karanavan) me gæna viniscaya dinadi allah movun atare tinduvak denu æta
